summary: A man is locked in a room for a challenge where he earns $10,000 per day, aiming to reach a million dollars in 100 days. Over the course, he sacrifices items in the room like an ice cream machine, drum set, and faces mental challenges, ultimately proposing to his girlfriend as he reaches his financial goal.
